params.name: pred
params.description: Predicted tensor, and its dtype is float32 or float64, andhas a shape of [batch_size, *, num_labels].

params.name: label
params.description: The ground truth tensor, and its dtype is int64, and has ashape of [batch_size, *] or [batch_size, *, num_labels] in onehot representation.

return.description: it contains two Tensor of shape [*, 1].The tuple should be passed to update function.
